Definition.WordDefinition: in so far adv : to the degree or extent; "insofar as it can be ascertained, the horse lung is comparable to that of man" [syn: {insofar}, {to that extent}, {to that degree}]
insofar adv : to the degree or extent; "insofar as it can be ascertained, the horse lung is comparable to that of man" [syn: {in so far}, {to that extent}, {to that degree}]
